page.title: 05The School Playground
page.content:
During the lunchtimes and breaktimes in the school day, children may play a variety of games either on their own or in groups of gangs.
{Chasing Games A lot of children play chasing games. These games vary from area to area, but each game is similar to the basic "tick" game. These games are very exciting because we experience fun as well as fear within the safety of our playground. { {Tick We play tick which is a game in which one person is "on" and they have to touch another person or persons. Then someone else is the next chaser. Other games may involve actions, singing, skipping, rhymes and ball games.
